PHRASE.LANG:
The Freaky Peeps are packaged as one sick set. Up-Chuck Peep, What the Bleep Peep and Scary Fairy Peep come packaged as Heavy Pets, Companions and Mini-Peeps! Nine fantastic treats in one big bundle! Colors as shown.
 This set includes the following items.


・Up-Chuck Peep - Puke Green
 ・Up-Chuck Peep - Static Mini - Puke Green
 ・Up-Chuck Peep - Heavy Pet - Puke Green
 ・What the Bleep Peep - Bone White
 ・What the Bleep Peep - Static Mini - Bone White
 ・What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - Bone White
 ・Scary Fairy Peep - Persnickety Purple
 ・Scary Fairy Peep - Static Mini - Persnickety Purple
 ・Scary Fairy Peep - Heavy Pet - Persnickety Purple


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Les Freaky Peeps sont groupes comme un ensemble de tonnerre. Up-Chuck Peep, What the Bleep Peep et Scary Fairey Peep viennent groupes comme Heavy Pets, Compagnons et Mini-Peeps! Neuf gâterie formidables en une grande panoplie! Couleurs comme montrées.[#Legal]

Die Freaky Peeps sind in einem Set verpackt. Up-Chuck Peep, What the Bleep Peep und Scary Fairy Peep kommen zusammen als Heavy Pets, Freundschafts- und Mini Peeps! Neun fantastische Figuren in einem Bündel! Farben wie abgebildet.[#Legal]

I Freaky Peeps vengono impachettati in un set da urlo. Up-Chuck Peep, What the Bleep Peep e Scary Fairey Peep vengono impachettati come Heavy Pets, Companions e Mini-Peeps! Nove fantastiche soprese in un unico pachetto! Colori come da mostra.[#Legal]

Los Freaky Peeps están empacados en un set de miedo. Up-Chuck Peep, What the Bleep Peep y Scary Fairey Peep estan empacados como Heavy Pets, Companions y Mini-Peeps! Nueve fantásticos regalos en un paquete único! Colores como la muestra.[#Legal]

Freaky Peep들을 하나의 최고의 패키지로 만나보세요. Up-Chuck Peep, What the Bleep Peep, Scary Fairy Peep을 Heavy Pet, 컴패니언, Mini-Peep 패키지로 만나실 수 있습니다! 하나의 번들로 9개의 환상적인 조합! 색상은 나타난 바와 같습니다.
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Up-Chuck Peep - 검푸른 초록
 ●Up-Chuck Peep - Static Mini - 검푸른 초록
 ●Up-Chuck Peep- Heavy Pet - 검푸른 초록
 ●What the Bleep Peep - 해골 화이트
 ●What the Bleep Peep - Static Mini - 해골 화이트
 ●What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - 해골 화이트
 ●Scary Fairy Peep - 소심한 퍼플
 ●Scary Fairy Peep - Static Mini - 소심한 퍼플
 ●Scary Fairy Peep - Heavy Pet - 소심한 퍼플


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

The Freaky Peeps are packaged as one sick set. Up-Chuck Peep, What the Bleep Peep and Scary Fairy Peep come packaged as Heavy Pets, Companions and Mini-Peeps! Nine fantastic treats in one big bundle! Colors as shown.

 ・What the Bleep Peep - Bone White

 ・What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - Bone White

 ・Scary Fairy Peep - Static Mini - Persnickety Purple

怪誕Peep組合包集合了所有怪人。Up-Chuck Peep、What the Bleep Peep和Scary Fairy Peep分別擁有三種型態：Heavy Pets、隨身夥伴和Mini-Peeps！一個組合包，給您九種驚喜！顏色如圖所示。
 本組合包含以下商品。


●Up-Chuck Peep - 嘔吐綠
 ●Up-Chuck Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 嘔吐綠
 ●Up-Chuck Peep - Heavy Pet - 嘔吐綠
 ●What the Bleep Peep - 枯骨白
 ●What the Bleep Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 枯骨白
 ●What the Bleep Peep - Heavy Pet - 枯骨白
 ●Scary Fairy Peep - 挑剔紫
 ●Scary Fairy Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 挑剔紫
 ●Scary Fairy Peep - Heavy Pet - 挑剔紫


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
